Partizani Tirana|Partizani Tirana]] with 17 championship titles won. == History == In august the 16th 1920, the patriot P. Nika altogether with gentlemen A. Erebara, P. Jakova, A. Hoxha, A. Koja, P. Berisha, A. Zajmi, H. Fortuzi, B. Pazari, L. Berisha, S. Frasheri, H. Alizoti, A. Gjitomi and V. Fekeci founded "Agimi Sports Association". In 1927 on the initiative of Mr S. Stermasi, Mr A. Erebara, Mr A. Zajmi and Mr A. Koja, "Agimi" changed its name to Sportklub Tirana (SK Tirana).KF Tirana-Basketball are 17 times Champions of Albania, and also 14 times winners of Albanian Cup. KF Tirana have also taken part in European Competitions, and in many friendly international tournaments.
